uploadSuccess:
Your product has been uploaded.
Please allow up to 24 hours for product approval.
uploadFail: Product upload failed. please try again.

category.title: Category
category.caution: If you register in a category that does not match the product, your product may be forcibly moved, stopped listing, or prohibited from listing.

productName.title: Product Name
productName.inputTitle: It must be 2~100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, slash, periods, parentheses, apostrophe and Ampersand.
productName.caution: If keywords are not directly related to the registered product, the registration can be prohibited by the administrator.
productName.hidden: You already have the same product name. Please try another one.

productImage.title: Product image
productImage.subTitle: The first photo will be the main product image. You can upload up to 5 images.
productImage.caution: If images are not directly related to the registered product, the registration can be deleted by the administrator.
productImage.alert: At least one product photo must be uploaded.

information.title: Product Information
information.subTitle: Please fill out the form correctly.
information.moqInputTitle: It must be 1~11 characters and can only contain numbers.
information.originPlaceholder: Please select a country from the drop down menu.
information.materialsInputTitle: It must be 1~100 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, comma, and hyphen.
information.caution: Leave blank for information you do not want to disclose.

introduction.title: Product Introduction
introduction.caution: Product details not directly related to the product name may be prohibited by the administrator.

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.subTitle: PDF only. Maximum upload file size :10MB

confirm.title: Confirm and Save
confirm.subTitle: Please confirm the information above before submitting it. The information will be updated immediately.

image.success: Your photo has been updated successfully.
image.fail: Photo update failed. Please try again.
image.upTo5: You can select up to 5 images.
